filename: 四年级下册英语重大版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: 英 语 四年级 下册 （三年级起点） 总主编 艾一培 总主审 余渭深 Matthew Bloise 主 编 刘莉丽 副主编 陈春晖 刘寅齐 编 者 （按姓氏笔画排列） 刘莉丽 刘寅齐 陈春晖 黄 宇 龚志维 绘 画 赵 静 音 乐 杨胜松 义务教育教科书 英 语 四年级 下册 （三年级起点） 主 编 刘莉丽 责任编辑：陈 亮 版式设计：牟 妮 责任校对：谢 芳 责任印制：赵 晟 * 重庆大学出版社出版发行 出版人：饶帮华 社址：重庆市沙坪坝区大学城西路21号 邮编： 401331 电话：（ 023 ） 88617190 88617185 （中小学） 传真：（ 023 ） 88617186 88617166 网址： http://www.cqup.com.cn 邮箱： fxk@cqup.com.cn （营销中心） 全国新华书店经销 重庆升光电力印务有限公司印刷 * 开本： 787mm × 1092mm 1/16 印张： 5.5 字数： 87 千 2002 年 8 月第 1 版 2012 年 6 月第 3 版 2019 年 12 月第 28 次印刷 ISBN 978 - 7 - 5624 - 7813 - 3 定价： 5.25 元 本书如有印刷 、 装订等质量问题 ， 本社负责调换 版权所有 ， 请勿擅自翻印和用本书 制作各类出版物及配套用书 ， 违者必究 朋友们，我们又见面了。让我们拉拉手，轻轻地说一声： “ 你好！ ” 我将再次牵着你的手，跟你一起走进英语学习的大门，去向小鸟学习唱 歌，去跟蓝天白云对话，去了解一片迷人的新天地，去结识更多的新 朋友。 我们将进入一个美好、神奇的儿童乐园。在这里，我们会融入种种奇 妙的情景中，学唱英语歌和英语童谣，学做游戏和画画，还要演一些简单 的英语小品，参加一些英语比赛。在这些活动中，你会自然地、愉快地学 会说英语，并记住许多英语单词。 你会发现，英语课是你最喜欢的课程。你就是课堂的小主人。老师和 同学一样，是一个平等的对话者。我敢肯定，你还会不时地拿起教鞭，神 气十足地当起小老师。 你的英语说得那么棒，你的英语歌唱得那么美，你的出色表现，一定 会得到老师的鼓励，同学们的赞美。在逐步提高英语听说能力的同时，你 的英语读写能力也会得到初步的发展，从而为进一步的学习打好基础。那 时候，你就能用英语跟 “ 老外 ” 交谈，用英语在超市购物，你还能用英文给 外国小朋友写信，让他们和你一起分享成功和快乐吧！ 当然，在学习中你也会碰到困难的。但不要忘了，还有我这个朋友 哦！我向你保证，我会永远帮助你、支持你。我们会永远在一起体验快 乐，迸发热情，增长知识，健康成长

metadata.source: 四年级下册英语重大版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: 。在这些活动中，你会自然地、愉快地学 会说英语，并记住许多英语单词。 你会发现，英语课是你最喜欢的课程。你就是课堂的小主人。老师和 同学一样，是一个平等的对话者。我敢肯定，你还会不时地拿起教鞭，神 气十足地当起小老师。 你的英语说得那么棒，你的英语歌唱得那么美，你的出色表现，一定 会得到老师的鼓励，同学们的赞美。在逐步提高英语听说能力的同时，你 的英语读写能力也会得到初步的发展，从而为进一步的学习打好基础。那 时候，你就能用英语跟 “ 老外 ” 交谈，用英语在超市购物，你还能用英文给 外国小朋友写信，让他们和你一起分享成功和快乐吧！ 当然，在学习中你也会碰到困难的。但不要忘了，还有我这个朋友 哦！我向你保证，我会永远帮助你、支持你。我们会永远在一起体验快 乐，迸发热情，增长知识，健康成长。 嗨！你准备好了吗？ 让我们开始吧！ look, fi nd listen say, talk, chant, read number, draw, link, match, tick, write, fi ll in, fi nish, send, choose practise, act, do, play, make sing cultural clips point circle colour count Contents Page Unit 1 Where Is My Pencil Box? 1 Unit 2 Welcome to Our Farm 11 Unit 3 There Is a Cake on the Table 21 Review 1 31 Unit 4 Whose Cap Is This? 36 Unit 5 When Is the Tiger Show? 46 Unit 6 How’s the Weather Today? 56 Review 2 66 Words in Each Unit 71 Word List 73 Children’s Garden 76 Mr. White Stanley Du Xiaomao Hao Tian Miss Liu Gao WendiLu Hua Max Mr. White Hao Tian Miss Liu Rex Lucy 1 Where Is My Pencil Box? Unit 1 Lesson 1 1. Look, listen and say Where are the crayons? · Gee, that’s funny. Where is my pencil box? They’re on the chair. · · Is it in your desk? · · · · Look, it’s on my desk. · · · No, it isn’t here. · · · · · Uh-oh! · · · · · · · Thanks a lot. · · · · · · Here you are. on the desk in the desk under the chair near the chair 1 2 3. Let’s practise 2. Listen and link Where is the train? Where are the rulers? It’s on the chair. It’s near the desk. They’re in the pencil box. 12 3 4 5 2 Where is the chair? 3 5. Let’s play a game 4. Listen and sing Where is the ruler? Where is the ruler? Under the desk? Yes. Try again. No. 1) Cover one’s eyes; 2) Hide a ruler; 3) Everyone shouts, “Where is the ruler?” Come on! H: That’s all right. Let me clean it again. S: Thanks. L: Look! What a clean classroom! S: Yes, it is. H: Ha! Ha...! What a dirty nose! S: Your nose is dirty, too. L: Let’s go and wash up. H&S: OK! Let’s go and wash up. L = Lu Hua S = Stanley H = Hao Tian S: Then, let me clean the blackboard

A: How many pigs do you have? B: I have f ive pigs. A: What can you see under the trees? B: There are some pigs. A: How many? B: There are f ive pigs. 32 A Find and tick B Talk about the picture 33 3. Find and match cat six map ship dress candle desk fan hen candy milk blackboard pink elephant lemon picture pig present 1) ___________ 2) ____________ 3) ____________ 4) ___________ 5) ____________ 6) ____________ 1) ___________ 2) ____________ 3) ____________ 4) ___________ 5) ____________ 6) ____________ 1) ____________ 2) ____________ 3) ____________ 4) ____________ 5) ____________ 6) ____________ 4) ___________ 5) ____________ 6) ____________ 1) ___________ 2) ____________ 3) ____________ 33 A Write the words with short “ a ” B Write the words with short “ e ” C Write the words with short “ i ” 34 4. Play a game There is a dog under the tree. What are these? Miss a turn. Draw a cake. Do you have pigs? 8 + 15 =? Where are the ducks? Go back 3 spaces. How many cows do you have? What’s on the table? Go ahead 2 spaces. My number is 27. I have 16 fl owers. Miss a turn. Run like a horse. What’s that in the grass? Go back 2 spaces. There are 8 candles in the box. chunks.content: 。3首2首1首 我能认读、书写英文单词和词组。12~15个 8~11个5~7个 我能询问出衣物的主人。5~6个3~4个1~2个 我能简单地描述天气情况。3~4句2句1句 我能借助图片听懂和朗读小对话。5~6个3~4个1~2个 我能和同学一块儿表演小故事。3个2个1个 25~30分 = 18~24分 = 12~17分 = 71 单元词汇表 （注：所有单词要求学生能听、说、读、写。） UNIT 1 in the desk on the desk near the chair under the chair UNIT 2 UNIT 3 Words in Each Unit blackboardmap fan schoolbag light cow farm pig horse tree hen grass flower sheep duck bird candle party present candy nineteen eighteen twenty-one twenty tablesixteen seventeen 71 sheep duck 72 UNIT 4 UNIT 5 UNIT 6 shorts trousers socks shoes fifty forty sixty thirty in the morning in the afternoon in the evening at night go running go walking listen to English do homework rainy cloudy sunny windy snowy warm hot cool cold 72 go running go walking rainy 73 词汇表 （注：黑体单词要求学生能听、说、读、写； 其他单词只作听、说、认读要求。） Word List 73 A at night .....................晚上（5） B bird ..............................鸟（2） birthday .....................生日（3） blackboard ..................黑板（1） C candle ........................蜡烛（3） candy ........................糖果（3） chair ........................椅子（1） cloudy .........多云的，阴天的（6） cold ........................寒冷的（6） cool ........................凉爽的（6） cow ...........................奶牛（2） D desk ...........................书桌（1） do homework ......做家庭作业（5） duck ........................鸭子（2） E eighteen ........................18（3） F fan ..................扇子，电扇（1） far ..............................远（6） farm ........................农场（2） f ifty ..............................50（4） f irst ...........................首先（6） f lower ...........................花（2） forty ...........................40（4） 注：词汇后括号内的数字为单元序号。 7474 G game ........................比赛（5） give me a hand .........帮我一下（1） go running ..................跑步（5） go walking ..................散步（5） grass ...........................草（2） H hen ...........................母鸡（2） Here you are. ............ 给你

chunks.content: ？（3） when ..................什么时间（5） where .....................在哪里（1） whose ........................谁的（4） why ........................为什么（4） windy .........多风的，风大的（6） 76 Song time Let’s sing and dance Children’s Garden Play time I’m grass, sleep, sleep, sleep. You’re a fl ower, smile, smile, smile. I’m a tree, shake, shake, shake. Yo u’re a bird, fl y, fl y, fl y. We’re hens, walk, walk, walk. You’re horses, run, run, run. We’re f ish, swim, swim, swim. You’re rabbits, jump, jump, jump. Listen, chant and do 76 77 Let’s read aloud these poems White sheep, white sheep, on a blue hill. When the wind stops, you all stand still. When the wind blows, you walk away slow. White sheep, white sheep, where do you go? Clouds A rainbow is beautiful, red, yellow, pink, green, purple, orange, blue true. A rainbow is magic if you believe in yourself. Rainbow Rain The rain is raining all around. It falls on fi elds and trees. It rains on the umbrellas here, and on the ships at sea. Snow Snow is falling. A beautiful sight. Snow is falling. It plays with the light. 77 Poem time Snow is falling. It’s time to play. Snow is falling. Let’s make snowmen today. 78 Show time Let’s read and act out It is a sunny day today. The sky is blue. The grass is green. The fl owers are smiling. The birds are singing. What a beautiful day! We Are Friends Sunny day, oh, sunny day! We want to dance. We want to play. We want to sing on the sunny day. What a nice day! What sweet grass! What beautiful fl owers! Hello, butterfl ies! Hi, fl owers! Nice to see you. Let’s dance and sing. All： Good idea. Let’s sing and dance. Hello, butterfl ies! Hello, butterfl ies! Hello, butterfl ies! Let’s dance and sing. Hi, fl owers! Nice to see you. Suddenly, Dark Cloud blots out the sun. Wind, Thunder and Rain come to make trouble. I’m coming! I’m coming! Whoosh, whoosh... I’m coming! Boom, boom... I’m coming! Pitter-patter, pitter-patter... 78 79 Oops! It’s windy. It’s cloudy. Oh, how awful! I hate cloudy days

chunks.content: . Hello, butterfl ies! Hello, butterfl ies! Hello, butterfl ies! Let’s dance and sing. Hi, fl owers! Nice to see you. Suddenly, Dark Cloud blots out the sun. Wind, Thunder and Rain come to make trouble. I’m coming! I’m coming! Whoosh, whoosh... I’m coming! Boom, boom... I’m coming! Pitter-patter, pitter-patter... 78 79 Oops! It’s windy. It’s cloudy. Oh, how awful! I hate cloudy days. I hate windy days. Oh, no, it’s raining. · · · · Yes, please. · · · · · Red Butterfl y, hide under my petals. Hurry! · · Yes, please. · · · · · · How kind of you! · · · Can I hide under your petals, Blue Flower? · Can I hide under your petals, Yellow Flower? 79 80 Before long, Sun comes out and drives away Dark Cloud, Wind, Thunder and Rain. Thunder, Thunder, go away! Wind, Wind, go away! Rain, Rain, go away! Dark Cloud, Dark Cloud, go away! Whoosh, whoosh... I am leaving. Boom, boom... I am leaving. Boom, boom... Pitter-patter, pitter-patter... We are leaving. Thank you, Flowers. Not at all. We’re friends. Yes, we’re friends. Thank you, Sun. Not at all. Thank you, Sun. Not at all. We are good friends. All： Yes. Yes. We are all good friends. Let’s sing and dance. All： Good idea! Let’s sing and dance together. The sun is shining. The birds are singing. The flowers are smiling. The butterflies are dancing. What a merry day! Yeah, what happy life! All： Sunny day, oh, sunny day! How we long for a sunny day... 80
